abstract: “All the people who are doing the real work, they’re not writing books because they’re too busy working right now,” Mr. Kushner said.
lead_paragraph: President Trump’s son-in-law Jared Kushner, a senior adviser in the White House, on Wednesday dismissed an unreleased book by John Bolton, the former National Security Adviser, asserting that Mr. Trump did delay millions of dollars in security assistance to Ukraine until officials there agreed to help with investigations into Democrats.
